Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Doll = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local activeSound
local equipped
local assetAwarded = false
local chartGui local chartFrame local chartAxis
local bars = {}
local axisImageAssets = {67748111, 67748179}
function returnToDefault() wait(4.0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) end
function drawChartInFace()
if chartGui and chartGui.Parent == nil and vPlayer and vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") then chartGui.Parent = vPlayer.PlayerGui if chartAxis then chartAxis.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. axisImageAssets[math.random(1, #axisImageAssets)] end for i = 1, 11 do local barImage = Instance.new("ImageLabel") barImage.Parent = chartFrame barImage.Name = "Bars" barImage.BackgroundTransparency = 0.0 barImage.Size = UDim2.new(0.07, 0, math.random()/5, 0) barImage.Position = UDim2.new(0.05 + i * 0.07, 0, 0.9, 0) barImage.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=67727216" table.insert(bars, barImage) end local drawTime = 4.5 while drawTime > 0 do for i = 1, #bars do if bars[i] then bars[i].Size = UDim2.new(bars[i].Size.X.Scale, 0, bars[i].Size.Y.Scale + (bars[i].Size.Y.Scale * math.random(0, 1)/6), 0) bars[i].Position = UDim2.new(bars[i].Position.X.Scale, 0, 1 - bars[i].Size.Y.Scale - 0.075, 0) end end wait(0.5) drawTime = drawTime - wait(0.5) end wait(3.0) if chartGui then chartGui.Parent = nil end for i = 1, #bars do if bars[i] then bars[i]:Destroy() end end bars = {} end end
function annoy() while equipped and myTorso and myHumanoid do tick() local randomElement = math.random(1, 100) print(randomElement) if randomElement == 1 then -- local AOE = Vector3.new(14, 14, 14) local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 12 and vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") then activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereTakeThis") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end local randomItem = vPlayer.Backpack:GetChildren()[math.random(1, #vPlayer.Backpack:GetChildren())] randomItem.Parent = game.Workspace if randomItem:FindFirstChild("Handle") then randomItem.Handle.Velocity = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 30.0 end end end end elseif randomElement > 1 and randomElement < 4 and not assetAwarded then -- Award asset local asset = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(19645489) asset = asset:GetChildren()[1] asset.Parent = vPlayer.Backpack assetAwarded = true activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("HereTakeThis") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end elseif randomElement > 4 and randomElement < 9 then if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.Jump = true end activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("WasThatApproved") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end elseif randomElement > 9 and randomElement < 23 then if myHumanoid then local ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 270 while myHumanoid.MaxHealth < 270 do myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 270 end myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 270 end activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("FinancialBlessing") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end elseif randomElement > 23 and randomElement < 60 then activeSound = Doll:FindFirstChild("LetMeShowYou") if activeSound then activeSound:Play() end drawChartInFace() end wait(1.5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
tick()
if math.random() < 0.5 then Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, -2.75) else Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(3, 1.8, -1.7) end
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(returnToDefault))
wait(6.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() equipped = true vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(annoy))
if vPlayer and vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") and vPlayer.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("ChartGui") == nil then chartGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") chartGui.Name = "ChartGui"
chartFrame = Instance.new("Frame") chartFrame.Parent = chartGui chartFrame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound chartFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 600, 0, 600) chartFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -300, 0.5, -300) chartFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
chartAxis = Instance.new("ImageLabel") chartAxis.Parent = chartFrame chartAxis.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) chartAxis.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) chartAxis.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 chartAxis.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=67727637" end end
function onUnequipped() if activeSound then activeSound:Stop() end if chartGui then chartGui:Destroy() end equipped = false myHumanoid.Health = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
